import {React,useRef} from "react"; import { useNavigate } from "react-router-dom"; import "../App.css"; import { Auth } from "../firebase-config"; import { useState, useEffect } from "react"; import { onAuthStateChanged, signOut } from "firebase/auth"; function Home() { const [user, setUser] = useState({}); const navigate = useNavigate(); const descInputRef = useRef(); useEffect(() => { onAuthStateChanged(Auth, (currentUser) => { setUser(currentUser); }); }, []); const logout = async () => { await signOut(Auth); navigate("/"); }; function submitHandler(event){ event.preventDefault(); const tweet = tweetInputRef.current.value; const meetingData = { tweet: tweet, } fetch('https://project-dd1f5-default-rtdb.firebaseio.com/meetings.json',{ method: 'POST', body: JSON.stringify(meetingData), }).then(()=>{ navigate('/', { replace: true }); }); } return (

Hello {user.email}

How are you doing today? Would you like to share something with the
community 🤗

{/* */}

Create Post

{/* */}
